about_us_text: IELTS Online Tests (IOT) belongs to InterGreat Education Group, founded in 2008, with branch offices located in 12 countries around the world. InterGreat’s head office is situated on Threadneedle Street in London, the iconic home of the Bank of England.
our_mission_text: IOT has currently been the most visited website in over 120 countries with more than 28 million students. We aim to provide IELTS test questions and exam tips for free, helping students improve their scores through a modern e-learning platform.
footer_text: © 2017-2025 InterGreat Education Group. IELTS is a registered trademark of University of Cambridge, the British Council, and IDP Education Australia. This site and its owners are not affiliated, approved or endorsed by them.
